transArray.content:
On a business trip to Beijing, I chose this hotel because it was a 2-minute walk from the company.
The small size of the room is a flaw, and it is not convenient for office work. 4 drills are a bit high.
It is a very fresh place to order takeaways delivered by robots, and the breakfast is relatively rich, not much worse than star hotels.
To sum up, it is not suitable for business trips, but it is suitable for travel, which is much better than ordinary chain hotels.
